name: The Quest (itch) (NanoVortex)
description:
My first game on Itch.io! Hope you enjoy and feedback is greatly appreciated! Note: there may be some bugs that I am unaware of, so please let me know if you run into any.

Play as a ninja going on a mysterious quest in order to return balance to a blocky origami-like paper world and defeat foes as you explore 3 unique levels.

Controls:

-Use WASD to move

-Space to jump

-Right click to attack

-Middle mouse button to change weapons

- "I" to interact with objects when applicable

- "T" to talk to NPCs

- "E" to enter/exit an area when applicable

- "Enter" to continue dialogue when applicable

- "Escape" to pause the game
